title: 我认为这是个最烦人的问题
txt_content: execute @a[m=2] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[team=zombie,type=zombie_villager,name="坦克僵尸",r=0] add attack1，这条指令，不明原因无法执行，各位帮看看！

replies.txt_content: 格式都正确，为什么就不正确呢？

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
388498173 发表于 2017-7-21 23:53
格式都正确，为什么就不正确呢？
选择器不能有中文

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content: 所以给tag的那个scb指令后面加上NBT检测...{CustomName}

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content: execute @a[m=2] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[team=zombie,type=zombie_villager,r=1] add attack1 {CustomName:"坦克僵尸"}

chyx 发表于 2017-7-22 08:40
选择器不能有中文
1.12版本了喔！

1345979462 发表于 2017-7-22 12:25
execute @a[m=2] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[team=zombie,type=zombie_villager,r=1] add attack1 {C ...
这个也无法执行啊！

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
388498173 发表于 2017-7-22 15:38
这个也无法执行啊！
execute @a[m=2] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[team=zombie,type=zombie_villager,r=8] add attack1 {CustomName:"坦克僵尸"}

倒是先把对应僵尸村民放出来

replies.author: qq473607497
replies.txt_content: execute @a[m=2] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[team=zombie,type=zombie_villager,r=1] add attack1 {CustomName:"坦克僵尸"}

1345979462 发表于 2017-7-22 16:05
execute @a[m=2] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[team=zombie,type=zombie_villager,r=8] add attack1  ...
都放了，甚至都放在我旁边了。
哦！劳烦各位了，我自己解决了！原来name这里的名字是不用加引号的
